name: db-migr
description: Javascript db migrations utility for SQLite, MySQL or other SQL Ansi databases
author: Lucas Ferreira <contato@lucasferreira.com> (https://github.com/lucasferreira)

scripts.build:commonjs: npm run clean:commonjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir dist/commonjs
scripts.build:es: npm run clean:es && cross-env NODE_ENV=es babel src --out-dir dist/es
scripts.build:umd: npm run clean:umd && cross-env NODE_ENV=umd babel src --out-dir dist/umd
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd
scripts.clean: npm run clean:commonjs && npm run clean:es && npm run clean:umd
